name: Decomposition (URLslug, snealthy, Nonikuniya, hellowhirled, Kantalope)
description:
A mysterious murderer has been assaulting different people; do you have what it take to stop them? Join a colorful cast of characters to unmask the killer and uncover the secrets of their past. Also, you only get one attempt to succeed in a save file: but failing a level doesn't mean game over!

  • Play four different rhythm sections with fast-paced dexterity-driven gameplay.
  • Custom-created soundtrack from unique genres, including indie rock, new wave, and breakbeat.
  • Diverse cast of 9 characters, with around 15 minutes of gameplay per run. 
  • 5 different endings, depending on your performance in the rhythm sections.

The complete soundtrack for this game is available at https://hellowhirled.bandcamp.com/album/decomposition-soundtrack
